programme.title: Mofy S3 - EP 0003 & 0004
programme.desc: Series follows the adventures of Mofy, a bunny who lives in a puffy cotton ball. Together with her best friend Kerry, a rog who wants to be a great composer, she travels through wonderful cotton landscapes learning about managing feelings and acquiring self-confidence along the way.

programme.title: Molang S2 - EP 0005, 0006, 0007 & 0008
programme.desc: Molang is an affectionate and humorous perspective on the relationship between an eccentric, joyful and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet and emotional little chick. Despite their many differences, these two enjoy a unique friendship.

programme.title: Teddies 2 - EP 33
programme.desc: Dom is out exploring the great outdoors - on a search for something amazing. In 5 minutes, 1st March will arrive. (PG)(重)知新发现，如果他们没有听到淑君的死讯，就不会在一阵巨响后醒来，重复过日子。于是他跟正方提议一个脱困的办法，就是将淑君送入院后迅速逃离，避免听医生宣布死讯。眼看时间一分一秒地过去，再过5分钟3月1日就将到来，正方却不舍得丢下淑君，急忙赶回急诊室….

(首播)第一集的《午餐吃什么？》戏剧阿姐郑惠玉和综艺阿姐鐘琴打头阵跟大家介绍午餐的好去处！两位潮州阿姐推荐的这家潮州粥已经有60多年的历史，到底有哪些菜是必点的？清粥小菜如何虏获两位阿姐的心？节目的下半场，李腾带大家来到有玩具也有美食的西式主题餐厅，这里有什么食物非吃不可？一小时的节目结合了多种美食，绝对让观众们大饱眼福！.

programme.title: 谢谢你不离不弃 By Your Side - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Xing En was born with Senior Loken Syndrome but only found out at the age of 3. Since then, her vision has deteriorated from 20% vision to almost blind. She faced another obstacle when she was found with undeveloped kidney at the age of 13, she has gone into dialysis since then. Mrs Tan used to be a part-time hairdresser, but devoted her time to look after Xing En both physically and emotionally. The two of them encourage each other, and together overcome the obstacles. (重)新恩从小就患有家族性肾视网膜营养不良，小时候的视力只有常人的20%，因此求学过程困难重重。而且雪上加霜的是她在13岁发现肾功能退化，家人之中没有适合的肾脏可以捐给她，医院换肾的名单又遥遥无期，因此她在13岁便开始了洗肾的日子。新恩经过了7-8年的洗肾，副作用和感染不断，经常进出医院，在20岁那年发生严重感染，曾有生命危险，后来2017年底成功等到换肾。新恩虽然身体有残疾，却没有因此自暴自弃，积极求学。母女两人在精神和体力上都彼此互相牵引、鼓励，才能顺利走过重重难关。.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 寻找新边际 Tuesday Report - The New Periphery - EP 4
programme.desc: Singapore, a little red dot, devoid of natural resources and sparse land, faces the difficulty of sustaining survival. However, we have come so far on this journey of nation-building. Through the ceaseless searching of survival methods, we have found ourselves economic opportunities, city building and management skills, and also food sources. 新加坡是一个弹丸小国，天然资源匮乏。这些年来新加坡之所以能立足于世界的大舞台，并且展露光芒，正因为新加坡多年来不断的掌握先机，不断的寻找新边际； 无论是开拓更多新食源、或是输出城市建设、改造与管理经验，新加坡都不遗余力，勇往直前。.

programme.title: 警徽天职之海岸卫队 C. L. I. F. 5 - EP 12

Jia Hao uses Dr Johnson's family to threaten him into revealing the formula. He relents and gives in. programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Osaka is the second-largest city in Japan but behind the bustling neon lights and vibrancy of the city, there is the existence of a little known slum. These abandoned slum dwellers receive free meals in the park, sleep rough and wander in the streets. Let's follow Yifeng and fixer to find out more. (PG)(重)大阪是日本第二大城市,繁华璀璨，霓虹闪亮的背后，有谁会知道大阪有个鲜为人知的贫民窟，公园领膳食，风餐露宿，流浪街头无人关问，落难当头被人弃。让权怡凤带大家跟随着线人的脚步前往一探究竟。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仙英嫉妒真淑和秀卿感情好，于是在秀卿生日当天告诉秀卿她的生母就是真淑。载永落井下石，说贤泰其实早就知道，但故意向她隐瞒。秀卿一时之间接受不了事实，没有出席家人们为她准备的生日庆祝会。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 12

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 8
programme.desc: For some years now, a mobile horse library helmed by a stable hand has been making its rounds around the villages of Serang. It's almost a quixotic quest to tackle Indonesia's low literacy by encouraging reading. Host Khai Saharom joins Ridwan Sururi in this endearing and noble effort to bring books to the villagers. On his journey, he meets Lasmi, a very shy young autistic girl whom Ridwan has successfully taught to read. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 8
programme.desc: Dian Xiao Er and Pu Tien are well known amongst Singaporeans but how well do they fare outside of our shores? In this episode, Bjorn travels to Shanghai to see if these two local popular restaurant chains can survive and thrive in the huge China market. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 8

However, Shimi says Shengzu's mother and Shengtai caused Shengzhu and Zuodou to break up. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠告诉艾瑞克，她打算重新负责吴赫的记录片。当胜珠的母亲知道吴作斗就是吴赫后，眼睛立刻发亮。但世弥却说她和胜泰的存在，是害胜珠和作斗分手的主要原因。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 24
programme.desc: Shengzhu finds out that Zuodou, for her sake, has overcome his psychological barrier and braced up to drive her back to Seoul. She is very touched. Shengtai complains to Tingwei that working is tough. Tingwei asks him to endure for the kid's sake. Zuodou is very happy when Shengzhu informs him first thing after she gets her new mobile phone. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)当胜珠知道作斗是为了自己才克服心理障碍,鼓起勇气开车来接她回首尔的，心里十分感动。胜泰向庭薇抱怨打工辛苦，庭薇要他为了孩子而忍耐。胜珠办了新手机后第一个通知作斗，让他开心不已。艾瑞克见状，不免吃醋。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. (重)《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. (重)《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Donghao suspects the real murderer is Nan Guiwan. He got someone to covertly capture on video Guiwan admitting he killed Zhenya. This proved his suspicion. When Guiwan discovers that he has been filmed unknowingly, he offers Donghao a high price to buy the video clip but Donghao refuses. Zhenyu and Renya sneak into Guiwan's villa to find clues of Zhenya's murder. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)东浩怀疑真正的凶手是南圭万，他命人去偷拍到了圭万说他杀死贞雅的视频，进一步证实了他的猜测。当圭万发现了被偷拍后，要花高价钱向东浩买下视频，但东浩不肯。振宇与仁雅偷偷潜回圭万的西村别墅寻找贞雅遇害的线索。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, Popstars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Some food for thought this week. Peifen must work for her munchies, by finding out the origins of some of Singapore's most popular dishes. What is that rumoured love story behind the Yam Basket Ring dish? Who are the Four Heavenly Kings our culinary scene? What's Singapore's connection to the evergreen Lo Hei dish that you gulp down during Chinese New Year? (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) One of China's greatest classical novels, "Dream of the Red Chamber" details the life and food of noble families. Host Danny Yeo visits Shanghai and Yangzhou to find a sumptuous feast inspired by this literature. (重)《红楼梦》可说是中国古代社会的一本百科全书，详细地描绘了当时贵族家庭的日常生活，也有许多关于美食的描述。这一集，主持人杨君伟将遵循古代名著的撰写，走访扬州与上海，寻找依据文字拼贴而出的一桌珍馐美味。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) For some years now, a mobile horse library helmed by a stable hand has been making its rounds around the villages of Serang. It's almost a quixotic quest to tackle Indonesia's low literacy by encouraging reading. Host Khai Saharom joins Ridwan Sururi in this endearing and noble effort to bring books to the villagers. On his journey, he meets Lasmi, a very shy young autistic girl whom Ridwan has successfully taught to read. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Dian Xiao Er and Pu Tien are well known amongst Singaporeans but how well do they fare outside of our shores? In this episode, Bjorn travels to Shanghai to see if these two local popular restaurant chains can survive and thrive in the huge China market. (重)在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan is shocked when she realizes that the security officer at her office building is Yuzhen's father. Her attitude towards Wancai changes immediately. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艺苑听说宇真的父亲到医院找他，本来想打招呼，却发现宇真的父亲原来是公司大楼的警卫，而且两人之前还曾经有过冲突。艺苑知道万才的身份后，对他的态度大大地改变。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 30
programme.desc: (R) Xizhen is misled into thinking that Yuzhen has already proposed to Yiyuan. She tells Xiuzi about Yiyuan's family background and suggests that Xiuzi meets with Guixi quickly to discuss about wedding issues. Xiuzi makes a fool of herself when she meets Guixi. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)熙真以为宇真向艺苑下跪求婚了，于是立刻告诉秀子艺苑的家庭背景，并提议秀子立刻去跟贵熙见面，商讨他们的婚事。秀子与贵熙见面，丑态百出，被贵熙看不起。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Bai Xi gives Xiuhao the ring that belongs to him and Haila in their past lives. Sharon wants to stay in Xiuhao's place for a month. Xiuhao reluctantly agrees. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)白熙把秀浩与海拉前世拥有的戒指还给秀浩。雪伦要求暂住在秀浩家一个月，秀浩无奈答应她。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Xiu Hao tells Bai Xi that Pu Zhemin is the culprit behind his father's death. Meanwhile, Sharon searches for past articles of the lab fire accident Xiuhao's father to get close to Xiuhao. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩告知白熙朴哲民是暗杀他父亲的凶手。雪伦为了接近秀浩，特意搜寻秀浩父亲实验室纵火事件的报道,还故意编造故事引起他的关注。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 9
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 25
programme.desc: Shengzhu and Wu He's relationship needs to be kept a secret as Shengzhu plans to produce Wu He's documentary. Zuodou sends Shengzhu home and makes all kinds of excuses to stay. Shengzhu initially has the intention to ask Zuodou to stay. However, Shengzhu quickly asks him to hide and leave when her mother appears. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠准备制作吴赫的纪录片，俩人的情侣身份因此必须保密。作斗送胜珠回家，找换灯泡等各种理由不肯离开。胜珠本也有意留作斗下来，但见到母亲出现，便连忙要他躲起来，并找机会快点离开。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 26
programme.desc: Eric helps to keep Shengzhu and Wu He's love affair under wraps even though he is jealous of Wu He. Shengtai's hard earned money is used to buy pizza for Tingwei. Shengtai's mother is furious when she knows about it. Canxi steals the video clip of Wu He confessing to Shengzhu and passes it to CEO Hong. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)艾瑞克虽然嫉妒吴赫，但也暗中保护着胜珠和吴赫的恋情以免曝光。胜泰辛苦打工赚钱，却只记得买披萨给庭薇吃，胜泰母知道后非常生气。灿希假借替胜珠搬摄影机为由，偷偷找出吴赫向胜珠告白的片段交给洪代表。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) When Nan Rihao found out his son had killed Zhenya, he approached Donghao and offered Donghao money not to represent Zaihe in the case. Donghao rejects Nan Rihao. He wants to expose the scandal committed by the heir of the Rihao Group and asks Nan Guiwan to give himself up before the trial. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)南日浩得知儿子杀害贞雅的事后，去见东浩要给他钱要求不要为载赫辩护，但东浩拒绝了，他要让所有的人都看到日浩集团继承人的丑行，只想南圭万在审判之前去自首。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In Japan, ramen is a popular form of fast food, with more than 130,000 ramen shops in Tokyo alone. What secrets enable chain stores and independent shops to stand out in amongst the competition? Undisclosed soup recipes, noodle-making techniques, or the relentless search for the best ingredients? (重)日式拉面五花八门，是日本上班族能快速填饱肚子的快餐。单单在东京就有超过13万家拉面店，所以各家必须使出浑身解数才能突围而出。连锁店和独立店家要在白热化的竞争中占有一席之地，究竟采用了什么杀手锏？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) There is a saying "Daughters are like split water"! But now, it seems otherwise. Men are caught in between the mother-in-law and wife, does it mean that women are taking mightier role in marriage? Is it true that having daughter is better than having son? Let's hear from Ian Fang and the guests! (重)人家说"女儿是泼出去的水" ！现今社会，是不是儿子才是泼出去的水？男人常被夹在婆媳关系之间，这代表女人在婚姻中的强势地位吗？如今，是不是生女儿更"划算"？新一代小生方伟杰和为人父母的嘉宾们一一给你剖析！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 58
programme.desc: (R) Everyone assumes that Xiuqing wants to reconcile with Zhenshu when she moves back into Zhenshu's house. Unknown to all however, Xiuqing plans to torment Zhenshu slowly. She criticizes and scolds Zhenshu behind Xiantai's back. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿决定搬回真淑家。大家以为她要跟真淑和好，但秀卿其实想慢慢折磨真淑。秀卿在贤泰面前表现得要跟真淑好好相处，私底下却对真淑口出恶言，一直伤害真淑。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Zhixu, Enhe and others have a meeting to analyze the evidence currently on hand. They conclude that Xianxiu is the most likely suspect in Xijun's murder. As the law firm does not have any right to search, Enhe volunteers to seek help from Youjing. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)智旭和恩赫等开会分析了目前的各项证据后，得出结论贤秀是杀死熙俊最可疑的人，但由于律师事务所没有搜查权，恩赫便自告奋勇去找宥静帮忙。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 73
programme.desc: Zhi-an blames Daojing for not telling her how Yanghao had bullied Taixiu and thinks Daojing is selfish for wanting her to accept his love without considering her position. Zhi-an returns the necklace to Daojing and wants him to forget her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安怪道京明知阳浩令太修受委屈却没有跟她说，让她跟打她父亲的人的孙子谈恋爱。知安觉得道京很自私，把项链还给道京，并要道京忘了她。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 74
programme.desc: Mingxi is shocked to find out that Zaicheng has been suffering from long-term depression. Mingxi apologises to Zaicheng and begs for his forgiveness. Shuxian tells Zhihao about her feelings for him. Zhihao likes Shuxian too, but both of them decides to remain as friends. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙发现载成原来长期被忧郁症折磨。明熙开口挽留载成，向他道歉。载成原谅明熙。书贤向知浩表白。两人虽然对彼此有爱意，但知道门不当户不对会很复杂，最后决定只做朋友。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 3
programme.desc: Aidan finally realizes after Xiao Hong is proven to be his daughter that he really does have the ability to turn all his lies into the truth. So he starts lying to his advantage and even uses this ability to clinch an important deal for the company, impressing both his Boss and immediate superior. De Hua questions Aidan why he did not think of wishing himself a million dollars. Aidan lies to De Hua that he will pick up a million dollars and the next day, Aidan does come across the chance to... (PG)Aidan恍然小红原来是自己谎言‘所生’的孩子后，证明了自己有让谎话成真的能力！于是，Aidan开始利用谎言，让自己无往不利，更替公司争取到一个重要的广告商机，令上司明烈对他刮目相看。德华不解Aidan为何不撒谎让自己拥有一百万？一言惊醒梦中人，Aidan于是对德华撒谎说自己将捡到一百万，隔日，Aidan果然在路上捡到了一百万！可是。。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 11
programme.desc: Zhiying plans to kill Shanmei to eliminate Devil King's suffering. Ba Jie alerts Devil King when he hears of Zhiying's plan. Devil King appears in the nick of time to save Shanmei from being stabbed by Zhiying. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)志英为了帮魔王去除体内的毒素，想刺杀善美。八戒知道志英的计划后赶紧通知魔王。魔王及时出现，为善美挡了一刀。.
